public class DNSDeployerImpl
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.processcompound.PrimProcessDeployerImpl

A prim deployer that uses DNS SRV records to locate process compounds.

addProcessLocator

public static void addProcessLocator(org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription cd,
                                     DNSServiceInstance service)
Adds the process locator info to a description. It should sign the sub-description if security is on.

Parameters:
cd - A target description to include the process locator info.
service - A service that provides the process locator info.
